properties.entry: INSERT INTO REVIEW( REVIEW_NO, REVIEW_NAME, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_AUTHOR, REVIEW_INSERT ) VALUES( SEQ_REVIEW.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, DEFAULT )

INSERT INTO FILES( FILES_NO, FILES_REVIEW_NO, FILES_ORIGIN_NAME, FILES_CHANGE_NAME, FILES_PATH, FILES_UPLOAD_DATE, FILES_STATUS ) VALUES( SEQ_FILES.NEXTVAL, SEQ_REVIEW.CURRVAL, ?, ?, ?, DEFAULT, DEFAULT )
SELECT * FROM REVIEW INNER JOIN MEMBER ON (REVIEW_AUTHOR=MEMBER_NO)
SELECT * FROM REVIEW INNER JOIN MEMBER ON (REVIEW_AUTHOR=MEMBER_NO) WHERE REVIEW_NO= ?
